title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 23.1 - Introduction
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 23.1 - Introduction

State Regulations

Section
401
(7)(g)
of the Vehicle and Traffic Law
authorizes the Commissioner of Motor Vehicles to classify motor vehicles for
the purpose of historical registration to include motor vehicles that have
unique characteristics so as to be of historical, classical or exhibition
value. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
23.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
